pr_title: Support Hibernate ORM's generation of Enhanced Proxies

timeline.message: Introduce an integration test triggering the need for enhanced proxies

Build Enhanced Proxy class instances during augmentation, then inject them in custom ProxyFactoryFactory implementation

This will allow to use the new feature "Enhanced Proxy" from Hibernate ORM upstream without needing runtime enhancers.
Make it an explicit requirement to have default constructors of entities

timeline.bodyText: Does that one throw the exception? It needs proxying?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
That code wasn't throwing an exception, as it was only storing a DummyEntity. If the test would have attempted to load it, you'd have had a runtime exception.
That seemed wrong to me (in many ways), so I made sure we throw an helpful (but fatal) error at build time to highlight the need for an empty constructor. Since it fails now, existing tests had to be fixed.
replies.author: Sanne
